#token.title: API Token
#token.description: An API token which will be used in authentication. You can generate an API key by navigating to Configuration > System > API.

organization.title: Organization Name
organization.description: Organization name, which is located in the URL. Usually, the URL is in format https://<ORGANIZATION>.ladesk.com, and only the organization name needs to be provided.

objects.title: Objects to download
objects.description: A list of objects for which statistics will be downloaded. One or multiple objects can be specified.

date.title: Date settings
date.description: Setting date range for which the statistics will be downloaded.

from.title: Start Date
from.description: Start date, from which the extractor will download data. Can be specified absolutely in format YYYY-MM-DD or relatively like 4 hours ago, 10 days ago, 3 months ago, etc.

until.title: End Date
until.description: End date, to which the extractor will download data. Can be specified absolutely in format YYYY-MM-DD or relatively like 4 hours ago, 10 days ago, 3 months ago, etc.
